item.description:
$7 Movie Tuesdays -The Last Stand(2013) -Please get tickets at 7:10PM. --Movie Start time 7:30PM.  We still meet at 7:15PM in Lobby to go in at 7:20PM to get good seats. Most seats are all new and very comfy!!

The Last Stand(2013) Details: After leaving his LAPD narcotics post following a bungled operation that left him wracked with remorse and regret, Sheriff Ray Owens moved out of Los Angeles and settled into a life fighting what little crime takes place in sleepy border town Sommerton Junction. But that peaceful existence is shattered when Gabriel Cortez, the most notorious, wanted drug kingpin in the western hemisphere, makes a deadly yet spectacular escape from an FBI prisoner convoy. With the help of a fierce band of lawless mercenaries led by the icy Burrell, Cortez begins racing towards the US-Mexico border at 250 mph in a specially-outfitted Corvette ZR1 with a hostage in tow. Cortez' path: straight through Summerton Junction, where the whole of the U.S. law enforcement, including Agent John Bannister will have their final opportunity to intercept him before the violent fugitive slips across the border forever. At first reluctant to become involved, and then counted out because of the perceived ineptitude of his small town force, Owens ultimately rallies his team and takes the matter into his own hands, setting the stage for a classic showdown.

 

Staring: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville, Forest Whitaker

MPAA Rating R (for strong bloody violence throughout, and language) Genres Thriller, Action/Adventure, Crime Run Time 1 hour 47 minutes

--------------------------------------------------

This looks like a great movie not to be missed on the Big Screen! So take a break from your work week and watch this great movie with us, some of your new pals. This movie looks great for 2012..... It’s time to see a great movie so do not miss out! You can't beat $7!

Location: Showcase Cinemas Woburn 25 Middlesex Canal Parkway, Woburn, MA.

Meet in the lobby. Walk into the lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note there is one on the right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables. This is so we have an exact spot to meet.

Ciao Biagio

-------------------------------------------------------------

Note: There is a pre Movie dinner at Tudo Na Brasa 414 Main St Woburn, MA at 6 PM. Please do sign up for this dinner  seperately.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby. Walk into lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note: NOT the one on right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables.
item.name: $7 Movie Tuesdays - The Last Stand(2013) with Arnold Schwarzenegger,
